channel.title: Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.1.0)
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.1.0)

item.title: Changelog
item.description: Changelog # All notable changes to this project are documented in this page. The format is based on Keep a Changelog. 1.1.0 - 2023-07-13 # Changed # Do not compress MergeToonLit generated texture on play #258 1.1.0-rc.1 - 2023-07-10 # 1.1.0-beta.2 - 2023-07-08 # Fixed # Asset files are not generated with Manual Bake #255 Merge Toon Lit duplicates vertex too many #256 This could causes huge increase in avatar size.
